snippet.title: ENJMIN - PaperPlane - Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer of our final year project at ENJMIN. PaperPlane is a game where you control a paper airplane through memories and reveal them by interacting with objects. Made with Unity3D.

Team : Martial Potron (Project Manager), Kévin Poupard (Game Designer), Pierre Hornez (Game Designer), Julien Barbe (Usability Expert), Pierre Lemasson (Graphics Designer), Ronan Kergosien (Graphics Designer), Laurent Martin (Sound Designer), Vincent Pancaldi (Programmer), Rémi Gillig (Programmer)

Music : Black Heroes by Ratatat
